headline: Does Las Vegas Sands Offer Opportunity After Tourism Rebound Boosts 2025 Outlook?
summary: If you have been wondering whether to take a fresh look at Las Vegas Sands, you are not alone. With its share price closing at $50.97 recently, LVS has been moving through some intriguing territory. Over the past week, the stock slipped by 5.6%, and it is down 7.9% over the last month. But here is where it gets interesting: the year-to-date return stands at a modest 2.1%. Go back just a few years, and you see gains of 25.1% over three years and 16.3% across five years. These shifts hint at...
